title: I don't have pulsefire ezreal icon even though i own Pulsefire ezreal
body: I owned pulsefire ezreal for ages now. But i found out that there was two icons, I do have the time portal icon but i don't have the pulsefire ezreal icon. I checked several times slowly scrolling up. Any ideas?

replies.body: I didn't get mine either. Please do something i own pulsefire ezreal and i really want that icon. Thanks
I seem to have the same problem.
Same here. I have the same problem.

I have your account pulled up now, and I do see that the Pulsefire Icon was added to your account on 5-26. They can be a little hard to find sometimes since they are sorted by release date and not by when you got them. Make sure to double check your icons for the PF Ezreal one!

https://i.gyazo.com/1929f4dfbdbbcae4cd997fc10dbbe599.png
Hi, I have the same problem here. Can't find it either.
That's super weird, I'm here checking if I have it and I can't find it at all
i dont have it either and have owned PFE for like ever
